name: Resolve
long_description:
At Resolve we’re building the future of collaboration and review for the construction industry. Today, Resolve helps bridge the communication gap between people who operate buildings and those who design and build them. We've built the most robust application for collaboratively reviewing complex facilities on the web and on wireless VR devices like the Oculus Quest. Our customers love it because it just works even with complex 3D building models.

From data centers to cutting-edge biopharma facilities, Resolve provides a collaborative virtual environment for operations & maintenance teams to review and interact with 3D building models at full scale - decreasing late stage changes during the construction process and delivering a safer, more easily operable building.

Our customers' facilities contain a multitude of complex systems which require careful coordination and review to ensure the building is completed on time and within budget. To prevent rework and increased building maintenance costs, Resolve fixes the broken system of screen-sharing 3D models and 2D floorplans with the operations teams that inherit the building and, instead, gives them easy access to their 3D building models before concrete is poured.
one_liner: Real-time BIM collaboration for fast, predictable construction

name: Sketchbox
long_description: Sketchbox is like WordPress for VR training simulations, we’ve built the underlying infrastructure that makes creating and updating VR training simulations fast. We primarily work with Fortune 500 companies, and all of our training sims include full student analytics and no-code scenario editors. All training simulations designed with Sketchbox work on the next generation of portable VR headsets, which are battery powered, don’t require a laptop and cost $400.

name: Supermedium
long_description:
Supermedium is a VR space to read books and comics, watch videos, view art, browse the Web, send messages, browse social media in a comfortable and focused environment. We're building a post-screen world to improve how we interact with technology by providing more screens, larger screens even while laying down, in a portable form factor.

https://supermedium.com/

name: MoFE
long_description: Museum of Future Experiences (MoFE) is a media tech company that creates, publishes and distributes high end immersive VR experiences.

name: Ramen VR
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; El Cerrito, CA, USA
long_description:
XR + AI are the most fundamental computing shifts of the past century.
We're using XR and AI to build products that empower creators of online games and virtual worlds.

Meaningful games can change lives, and every game starts with its developers. We believe that game devs can change the world.
‍
We're a team of devs working on solving the hardest problems in game development. We previously built the #1 VR game Zenith: The Last City on Steam and Quest.

We've raised $40m+ to date and have been working in stealth on our next game as well as tools that will shape the future of game development.
one_liner: Ramen VR is transforming game development with advanced XR + AI tools.

name: Degrees of Freedom
long_description: Degrees of Freedom offers a high-quality, low-cost degree, by blending virtual and traditional college models. Our students learn on-campus, and online on-line, and in-VR from diverse Ivy League professors and master teachers-- all at the cost of the Pell Grant
one_liner: DoF provides a high quality, affordable higher education alternative.

name: Filta
long_description: Filta is the face filter NFT marketplace being built by veterans from Pixar/Oculus/Facebook. We partner with creators to release limited-edition filters for their fans to use on social media. It turns out: the face filters you see everywhere on Snapchat and Instagram are created by independent artists - not by the platforms. These artists ALMOST NEVER get money for their work - which is insane! Filta fixes this by giving these creators a marketplace and the best filter creation tool anywhere. Interested in working on the future of digital fashion, AR/VR, and web3? Hit us up. We're hiring.

name: Gym Class - by IRL Studios
long_description: Gym Class is the top sports game in VR, where you can play basketball, baseball, football (and more) with people around the world. Download to make friends, compete to become a star, or just break a sweat. Join us on our mission is to connect the world by simulating it.

name: Hyperbeam
long_description:
Emebedding third-party apps and websites can often be a nightmare due to incompatible platforms, security issues, and poor UX. Adding multiplayer functionality to these embeds makes this problem exponentially more difficult.

Enter Hyperbeam—an API that lets you embed virtual computers anywhere, including web, mobile, VR, and even VSCode. You can then open any third-party website or application, synchronize audio and video flawlessly among multiple participants, and add multi-user control with just a few lines of code. Uses cases and customer segments include remote learning, virtual offices, online casinos, productivity, watch parties and more.

We are three technical founders from the University of Waterloo, and worked as engineers at Facebook, Yahoo, and Lyft. Our technology is battle-tested–we currently stream over 1.25M hours of video per month across every continent. https://hyperbeam.com?ch=yc
one_liner: API for shared embeddable web browsers

name: Lifecast
long_description: We make tools for state-of-the-art 3D VR video, which fix motion sickness for a more comfortable and immersive experience. Our team's experience includes building VR cameras at Facebook, and robot perception systems at Lyft and Google X.
one_liner: Software to create 3D video for VR, robotics and film.

name: UNISON
all_locations: Mountain View, CA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA
long_description:
UNISON is building a unified reality headset to dive in and resurface from virtual worlds with new-found value.

UNISON is a small team of passionate people from companies like Meta, Sony, Apple and research labs like the IARAI, based in the SF Bay Area and backed by some of the world’s best investors. Learn more about us, our product, and team here: in-unison.com.
one_liner: Live between worlds, in UNISON, using the headset we're building!

name: Diversion
long_description: Diversion is a modern alternative to Perforce and Git, designed for digital entertainment industries like games, virtual production, animation, and 3D/VR. It streamlines collaboration by providing GitHub-like version control for large files and complex projects, integrating seamlessly with tools like Unreal Engine. Built for studios handling massive assets, Diversion ensures efficient workflows, secure storage, and effortless tracking of project history, making it the go-to platform for creative teams managing evolving digital content.
one_liner: A scalable, cloud-native Perforce and Git alternative

name: Vinci Games
long_description:
Vinci Games is building Take Two Interactive for AAA VR games. We're building the next-generation ATT games for AR/VR. 

Blacktop Hoops is the ultimate VR basketball game and sports experience. Embark on a hoops journey in career mode, ball against bots, hang out with friends in online courts, or climb the rankings in competitive pickup games. Design your perfect avatar with millions of unique combinations. Do you have what it takes to become the GOAT? 🐐

The company is led by CEO Nathan Ventura who led world-class developer programs at Oculus, Google, and Unity and CTO Maciej Szcześnik who was the lead gameplay designer at CD Projekt Red for the award-winning Witcher series.
one_liner: Take Two Interactive for VR games.
